name: Gregory C. DIXON, Appellee, v. CITY OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., arid ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Gregory C. DIXON, Appellee, v. CITY OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Virginia Spencer Scott, Jacqueline R. Morrow, Pittsburgh, for City of Pittsburgh.
Keithley D. Mulvihill, Susan E. Malie, Pittsburgh, for Gregory Dixon.
casebody.head_matter:
737 A.2d 248
Gregory C. DIXON, Appellee, v. CITY OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 15, 1999.
Decided Oct. 4, 1999.
Virginia Spencer Scott, Jacqueline R. Morrow, Pittsburgh, for City of Pittsburgh.
Keithley D. Mulvihill, Susan E. Malie, Pittsburgh, for Gregory Dixon.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., arid ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
